Question.Subject: in firefox i cant change my profile pic in orkut?
Question.Content: i am using the lastest version of firefox browser. i can change profile wid much difficulty in IE 6. i am not using genuine windows. can this b the problem? i tried all sorts of tricks googling my way but i fail. what is the solution? wy orkut suks so much like its users?? grrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.......... :( firefox 3.6.2
Question.ChosenAnswer: first it is not due to fake windows. try google chrome, it can fix problem. but i use firefox and i can change my pic easily through that. are you using firefox 3.5 or 3.6? these have no problem.

Answer.Content: first it is not due to fake windows. try google chrome, it can fix problem. but i use firefox and i can change my pic easily through that. are you using firefox 3.5 or 3.6? these have no problem.
